income_messages:
From: w**********************5@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-24 22:25:48
SUBJECT:   WORLD BANK GROUP
  WORLD BANK GROUP
Washington DC.
Confidential mail.
Attention: Sir
This is World Bank Group Washington DC; we wish to inform you that you have been verified for the refund of your contract payment. The IMF has given instruction to remit the below fund to you once you are able to comply with our directives.
Your document was signed by someone who claims to be your next of kin. We expect to hear from you immediately as Mr. Henderson Graham, who claims to be your representative, has reported that you died of Covid-19 last year, advising us to release your payment to him.
Your name was mentioned as one of the Scam victims, So we have mapped out $25musd for you, based on the United Nations refund committee resolution.  
 If you're still alive please kindly reconfirm your name, banking details, contact phone number, address together with your id. Forward your details to this email: 
worldbankwashingtondc745@gmail.com
Thanks   
From: w**********************5@gmail.com
To: yc07554@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-24 22:40:06
SUBJECT: Re: WORLD BANK GROUP
Attention: Timothy
We are glad to hear from you, it is so bad that someone is trying to claim
your fund.
We will report the matter to the FBI.
Right now there is no time , you have to forward your banking details
address and telephone number.
We will proceed with the transfer and once you confirm your fund kindly
contact us for record purpose thanks
contact +6466315899
Mr Wayne Mitchell
Thanks
[image: IMG_4441.jpg]
From: w**********************5@gmail.com
To: yc07554@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-25 02:24:26
SUBJECT: Re: WORLD BANK GROUP
No sir
All you have to do is to send your information let’s proceed with your
funds.
Thanks

SUBJECT: Re: WORLD BANK GROUP
Once you provide your details we will proceed as soon as possible.
From: w**********************5@gmail.com
To: yc07554@l******s.email
Time: 2023-05-01 11:27:59
SUBJECT: Re: WORLD BANK GROUP
Dear Timothy ,
Greetings to you.
Following the receipt of your email message , there is no potential risk
involved because everything is legally and 100% guaranteed under Financial
banking laws,
Let's discuss further about the said fund payment under our custody so we
can get to know each other better before we proceed.
Rest assured that we are a reputable financial institution so all I want is
a sincere partnership that could assist us to receive this fund for
investment purposes which will give us good ROI every end of the year.
I wait for your number to reach you lets deliberate.
Kind Regards,
Mr Wayne Mitchell
From: w**********************5@gmail.com
To: yc07554@l******s.email
Time: 2023-05-01 15:04:43
SUBJECT: Re: WORLD BANK GROUP
Kindly find the NCDA for your reference and feedback.
We are dealing with a reputable company for investment purposes, No risk
involved.

To: yc07554@l******s.email
